subject: Must have pills
body:
Dear valued member.
Tell us straight - are you really that eager to buy artificially overpriced product? Stop wasting time and money - switch to Canadian products.
Don't be afraid of the word "Canadian" - the product offered is produced at branch plants of Pfizer, Johnson & Johnson and other major USA manufacturers which already means that the quality of the product is unimpeachable.
Get the best deal right now while the Spring Sale is still on - visit MyCanadianPharmacy right now.http://knewpush.hk
-------------------------------------------
Yours faithfully,Keith Wright
